page.title: 18Clubs in New Mills
page.content: There are quite a few clubs in New Mills. There is a golf club, a football club and K.Y.T.E. which stands for Kinder Youth Theatre,quite a few people in New Mills belong to it.They have performed a lot of shows. The cricket club is also a social club,it has a bowling green next to it and it has its own clubhouse with a bar and changing rooms.There is also a gym club in New Mills.The oldest brass band in the world is in New Mills it stopped because of the 1st World War and was called New Mills Old Prize Band.Most of the members where killed in the war.It is now called New Mills CO-OP Band.
